Title: Paris hospitals near coronavirus breaking point - Reuters India
Description: A spike in coronavirus cases will put France under huge pressure in coming days, its prime minister said on Friday, after reporting its biggest daily death toll and officials fearing hospitals in and around Paris could be saturated in 48 hours.

Title: Coronavirus: Facebook, Indian govt creates messenger chatbot for COVID-19 info; adds Hindi capability - YourStory
Description: Facebook users can start accessing the Corona Helpdesk Chatbot and reach out to the Ministry of Health for authentic news on coronavirus, official updates, precautionary measures, and emergency helpline numbers.

Title: COVID-19: Indian govt to bring CoWin-20, Corona Kavach apps soon to mitigate community spread - Deccan Herald
Description: State-run Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MietY) is testing a novel application Corona Kavach, which aims to protect Indian citizens from getting infected by COVID-19. As of now, most of the 700 odd people with coronavirus are foreign retu…

Title: Coronavirus: In race to defend India's health workers, makers of protective gear rue wasted time - India Today
Description: Manufacturers say poor communication has led to the squandering of precious time in the race to protect India's health workers fighting the coronavirus pandemic.

Title: Coronavirus pandemic: Sushmita Sen recommends this medicine for COVID-19 and we feel it might be life-changing! - Times of India
Description: While a cure for coronavirus is yet to be found and the world is still in the trial phases of developing vaccines for the deadly virus, Sushmita Sen might’ve found a medicine that could guarantee safety during this terrible outbreak. The actress posted a pict…

Title: Coronavirus Treatment: HIV Drug Used To Cure COVID-19 Positive British National In India - International Business Times
Description: Indian doctors have saved the life of a COVID-19 positive British National using anti-HIV medications.

Title: Coronavirus impact: How did Modi govt arrive at 21-day lockdown period and not 14 - International Business Times, India Edition
Description: There is scientific evidence and epidemiological significance to reason out why the Modi government imposed a national lockdown period of 21-days and not lesser than 21.

Title: Is loss of taste or smell an early warning sign of coronavirus infection? - India TV News
Description: A loss of smell or taste might be an early sign of infection with the coronavirus, say medical experts who cite reports from several countries. It might even serve as a useful screening tool, they say
